verses.verse: He that <S%H6504>separateth<s%> himself <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> his own <S%H8378>desire<s%>, And <S%H1566>rageth<s%> against all sound <S%H8454>wisdom<s%>.
A <S%H3684>fool<s%> hath no <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H8394>understanding<s%>, But only that his <S%H3820>heart<s%> may reveal <S%H1540>itself<s%>.
When the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>, there <S%H935>cometh<s%> also <S%H937>contempt<s%>, And with <S%H7036>ignominy<s%> cometh <S%H2781>reproach<s%>.

The <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are as <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>; The <S%H4726>wellspring<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is as a <S%H5042>flowing<s%> <S%H5158>brook<s%>.
To <S%H5375>respect<s%> the <S%H6440>person<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is not <S%H2896>good<s%>, Nor to turn <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.
A <S%H3684>fool<s%>'s <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H7379>contention<s%>, And his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H7121>calleth<s%> for <S%H4112>stripes<s%>.
A <S%H3684>fool<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is his <S%H4288>destruction<s%>, And his <S%H8193>lips<s%> are the <S%H4170>snare<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H5372>whisperer<s%> are as dainty <S%H3859>morsels<s%>, And they go <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H990>the<s%> innermost <S%H2315>parts<s%>.
He also that is <S%H7503>slack<s%> in his <S%H4399>work<s%> Is <S%H251>brother<s%> to him that is <S%H1167>a<s%> <S%H7843>destroyer<s%>.
The <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is a <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4026>tower<s%>; The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7323>runneth<s%> into <S%H7682>it<s%>, and is safe.
The rich <S%H6223>man<s%>'s <S%H1952>wealth<s%> is his <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%>, And as a <S%H7682>high<s%> <S%H2346>wall<s%> in his own <S%H4906>imagination<s%>.
Before <S%H6440><s%> <S%H7667>destruction<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H1361>haughty<s%>; And <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3519>honor<s%> goeth <S%H6038>humility<s%>.
He that <S%H1697>giveth<s%> <S%H7725>answer<s%> before he <S%H8085>heareth<s%>, It is <S%H200>folly<s%> and shame unto <S%H3639>him<s%>.
The <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> will <S%H3557>sustain<s%> his <S%H4245>infirmity<s%>; But a <S%H5218>broken<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> who can <S%H5375>bear<s%>?
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H995>prudent<s%> <S%H7069>getteth<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>; And the <S%H241>ear<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>.
A <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H4976>gift<s%> maketh <S%H7337>room<s%> for <S%H5148>him<s%>, And bringeth him <S%H6440>before<s%> great <S%H1419>men<s%>.
He that pleadeth his <S%H7379>cause<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> seemeth <S%H6662>just<s%>; But his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> and searcheth him <S%H2713>out<s%>.
The <S%H1486>lot<s%> causeth <S%H4079>contentions<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%>, And <S%H6504>parteth<s%> between the <S%H6099>mighty<s%>.
A <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6586>offended<s%> is harder to be won than a <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%>; And such <S%H4079>contentions<s%> are like the <S%H1280>bars<s%> of a <S%H759>castle<s%>.

A <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H990>belly<s%> shall be <S%H7646>filled<s%> with the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; With the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall he be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>.
Death <S%H4194><s%> and <S%H2416>life<s%> are in the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H3956>tongue<s%>; And they that <S%H157>love<s%> it shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the fruit <S%H6529>thereof<s%>.
Whoso <S%H4672>findeth<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H4672>findeth<s%> a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H6329>thing<s%>, And obtaineth <S%H7522>favor<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
The <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H1696>useth<s%> <S%H8469>entreaties<s%>; But the <S%H6223>rich<s%> <S%H6030>answereth<s%> <S%H5794>roughly<s%>.

He <S%H376><s%> that maketh many <S%H7453>friends<s%> doeth it to his own <S%H7489>destruction<s%>; But there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H157>friend<s%> that sticketh <S%H1695>closer<s%> than a <S%H251>brother<s%>.
